<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:food}}: The food stats applied to the mob or player upon consuming this item. If this and <code>[[Data component format#consumable|minecraft:consumable]]</code> (<code>consumable</code> is required) are present on an item, a fox can consume the item when holding it in its mouth for 30 seconds.
*** {{nbt|int|nutrition}}: The number of food points restored by this item when eaten. Must be a non-negative integer.
*** {{nbt|float|saturation}}: The amount of saturation restored by this item when eaten.
*** {{nbt|boolean|can_always_eat}}: If {{cd|true}}, this item can be eaten even if the player is not hungry. Defaults to {{cd|false}}.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
